text: Igor Anatolyevich Komarov (born May 25, 1964 in Engels, Saratov Oblast) is a Russian industrialist, financier and manager. Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Russian Federation in the Volga Federal District from September 18, 2018 (acting from September 7 to September 18). In March 2014, the government appointed the head of the United Rocket and Space Corporation (ORKK). Director General of the State Corporation for Space Activities "Roskosmos" (January 21, 2015 – May 24, 2018). == Biography == Igor Komarov in 1986 graduated from the Moscow State University. MV Lomonosov specialty "economist". From 1992 to 2002 he worked in credit and financial institutions in executive positions (Inkombank, National Reserve Bank, Sberbank). From 2002 to 2008 he was Deputy General Director of OJSC Mining and Metallurgical Company Norilsk Nickel for Economics and Finance. Since October 2008, he held the position of Adviser to the General Director of the State Corporation "Rostekhnologii", in May 2009 was appointed Executive Vice President of JSC AVTOVAZ, and on August 28, 2009 - appointed President of this company.Игорь Комаров: три года у руля АВТОВАЗа. // Журнал «За рулём» On October 1, 2009, Igor Komarov was elected Chairman of the Board of Directors of ZAO GM-AVTOVAZ. October 16, 2013 Igor Komarov announced his resignation as president of JSC AVTOVAZ. Formally, his departure from the post of president of the car concern, he justified the transition to a new job, the president of the United Space Rocket Corporation. During his time as President of AvtoVAZ, from 2009 to 2013, Igor Komarov and his team carried out reforms to radically reorganize the car factory. October 23, 2013 by the order of the Chairman of the Government of the Russian Federation DA Medvedev was appointed deputy head of the Federal Space Agency (Roskosmos). In March 2014, the government appointed the head of the United Rocket and Space Corporation. On January 21, 2015, he headed the Roskosmos State Corporation.Попытка № 5 Из Роскосмоса и ОРКК создадут восьмую по счету госкорпорацию в стране On May 24, 2018, by the Decree of the President of the Russian Federation, the General Director of Roskosmos State Corporation was dismissed from office.
